okay ive commented twice on this torrent its a great upload, everything works fine (if your pc can handle it, which shoudlnt be a prob for most cuz the GFX seriously blow)...however besides the saves not working...ive seen so many people talking about how this is a shit game...i of course dont believe anything anyone says until i try it....but i must say this game really is VERY shitty...clunky controls...most of the areas you go to are exactly the same just slightly altered car positions...the lighting and graphics are something of the playstation 2 era...activision has literally ruined any hopes of getting a worthwhile game. I was hoping for kinda a FarCry 3 in the walking dead universe...and ive never been so let down in my life...played about a half hour and deleted it immediately...If you're not really caring about GFX or gameplay that keeps you wanting to press forward...then you may enjoy this...other than that this is going to be (mark my words) one of the worst games of 2013....thanks activision...you seriously ate a bowl of dicks on this one...
